alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 5:23PM CDT until July 25 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cavalier County in northeastern North Dakota... North central Walsh County in northeastern North Dakota... Southwestern Pembina County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Union, or 21 miles southeast of Langdon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Thomas, Hoople, Edinburg, Crystal, Mountain, Milton and Nash. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
